meanings.definition: To try to do something again after a previous attempt was unsuccessful.
meanings.sent1: She decided to reattempt the puzzle after failing the first time.
meanings.sent2: He is reattempting the math problem to get the correct answer.
meanings.sent3: After reattempting to bake the cake, she realized she forgot the sugar.
meanings.sent4: The runner kept reattempting the race, determined to finish strong.
meanings.sent5: The student's dedication showed as he kept reattempting the challenging assignment.
